title: The substance of Christian religion, or, A plain and easie draught of the Christian catechisme in LII lectures on chosen texts of Scripture, for each Lords-day of the year, learnedly and perspicuously illustrated with doctrines, reasons, and uses / by that reverend and worthy laborer in the Lord's vineyard, William Ames ...
author: Ames, William, 1576-1633.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T. Mabb for Thomas Davies, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
